item.title: Netflix Consumer Products Chief Leaves for Funko CEO Role
item.description: Josh Simon had created products for the streaming giant’s biggest titles, including ‘Stranger Things,’ ‘Bridgerton’ and ‘Squid Game.’

item.title: Netflix Consumer Products Boss Josh Simon Exits to Become Funko CEO
item.description: Netflix’s head of consumer products, Josh Simon, has exited the streamer to become CEO at Funko. Simon, who succeeds interim Funko CEO Mike Lunsford, will begin in his new role at the pop-cultur
